Boots of Stone

boots (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 256
stoneskin [stoneskin]: 15 protection (+2 if already over 15)
(mountain-survival [mount])

Requires 10E to forge (E2)

When these soft boots are put on, they will become quite hard, almost like stone. The same happens to the wearer's skin, giving him excellent protection without hampering his movement. The wearer will also find it much easier to climb rock surfaces and he will be able to travel through difficult mountain passes without any trouble.
